Class ModifyDnOperation

    Operation<ModifyDnRequest,​ModifyDnResponse>
    public class ModifyDnOperation
extends AbstractOperation<ModifyDnRequest,​ModifyDnResponse>
    Executes an ldap modify DN operation.
